      • makeSpaceForTopo

        public boolean makeSpaceForTopo(TopologyDetails td)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEvictionStrategy

        This method when invoked should attempt to make space on the cluster so that the topology specified can be scheduled

        定義:
        makeSpaceForTopo インタフェース内 IEvictionStrategy
        パラメータ:
        td - the topology to make space for
        戻り値:
        return true to indicate that space has been made for topology and try schedule topology td again. Return false to inidcate that no space could be made for the topology on the cluster and the scheduler should give up trying to schedule the topology for this round of scheduling. This method will be invoked until the topology indicated could be scheduled or the method returns false
